Have a nice day

patterns: What is the customer care number?
Can you tell me the number to contact customer care?
responses: The 24/7 customer care number is 1800-455-455
You can contact the 24/7 customer care helpline number 1800-455-455

patterns: How do I create a new account?
Can you tell me how to create a new account?
What do I need to do to create a new account?
responses: To create a new account, you can select the 'New Customer' option on our home page. From there, further instructions on creating the type of account you want

patterns: What is the minimum balance required in an account?
What is the least amount of money required in an account?
How less money can I keep in my bank account?
Is there a minium balance limit?
responses: The minimum balance in a savings account is Rs.5000 and Rs. 100000 in a current account.

patterns: Is there a maintenance fees for minimum balance?
Is there a penalty for not maintaining minimum balance?
Do I get a penalty for not maintaining minimum balance?
Penalty for non-maintenance of minimum balance
Charges for not maintaining minimum balance
responses: Rs. 100 and Rs. 5000 shall be charged for not maintaining proper balance for Savings and Salary Account respectively. Please refer to the schedule of charges in your respective account

patterns: How do I update my mobile number?
Where do I update my mobile number?
How do I update the number linked to my account?
responses: To update your mobile number, kindly login into your account and select the option 'Change Account Details' > 'Change Mobile Number' > Enter the current mobile number and then enter the new mobile number. Your mobile number shall be updated within 3 hours.

patterns: Update my email linked to my account
How do I update my e-mail?
Can you tell me how to update my email?
responses: To update your E-mail ID linked to your account, kindly login into your account and select the option 'Change Account Details' > 'Change E-mail' > Enter the current E-mail ID and then enter the new E-mail ID. Your E-mail shall be updated within 3 hours.

patterns: Update the name of the account holder
How to update account holder name?
Where do I update the name of the account holder?
responses: To update the name of the account holder, please visit the nearest branch along with the current account holder and an identity proof of the new owner of the account

patterns: How do I stop a cheque payment
Can I stop a cheque payment?
Can I halt a cheque payment?
Can I cancel a check payment?
responses: It can be done through the branch, netbanking, mobile banking, and also by calling the customer care number

patterns: How do I check my account balance?
How much money is left in my account?
What are the different transactions I've made?
Can you show me my account summary?
responses: To check your account summary, transaction history, and your account balance, kindly login into your account and select the 'Account Summary' option

patterns: how do I change my transaction limit?
change transaction limit for savings account
change transaction limit for current account
responses: The default transaction limit for both a savings account and a current account is Rs. 100000. The maximum limit for a savings account is Rs. 1000000 and for a current account is Rs. 5000000. You can change your account limit by logging into your account and selecting 'Change Account Details' > 'Change Transaction Limit' > Enter the new limit > Save

patterns: can you tell me how to change my address?
how long does it take for address to change?
responses: Please contact the nearest branch for changing your address. It shall take 7 days for your address to change.

patterns: how to change the type of account
how to I change my account type
responses: Your account type is mentioned right below your profile in the welcome page. To change the type of your account, kindly contact your branch manager

patterns: how do I apply for a new debit card?
apply for a new debit card
how do I renew my debit card?
responses: To apply for a new debit card, fill out the application form linked on our front page, or contact the nearest branch for applying for a new card. To renew your debit card, select the 'Update Expired Card' option. The new card shall be delivered in between 15 to 20 working days

patterns: how do I apply for a new credit card?
apply for a new credit card
how do I renew my credit card?
responses: To apply for a new credit card, fill out the application form linked on our front page, or contact the nearest branch for applying for a new card. To renew your credit card, select the 'Update Expired Card' option. The new card shall be delivered in between 15 to 20 working days

patterns: How do I request for a passbook?
How can I get a passbook for my account?
How to apply for new passbook?
responses: A passbook shall be issued on the opening of an account. However, upon the pages of the passbook being filled, a new passbook can be issued by visiting the respective branch the account is linked to

patterns: How do I block a card?
What do I do if I lose a card?
I don't use this card anymore
responses: In case of a card being lost or a card not being used anymore, you can contact customer care to request for the blocking of the particular card within 48 hours of it being lost or unused

patterns: What loans can I avail for?
What loans can I get from the bank?
responses: Capital Bank provides loans on various interest rates for various purposes, like Vehicle Loans, Home loans, Personal Loans, Student Loans, to name a few. To avail any of these on the specified interest rates, check the loan-info page on our website. For further information or order of payments regarding an availed loan, contact customer care.

patterns: How do I do net banking?
What are the rules of net banking?
responses: The net banking feature allows users to make transactions online. A unique account ID and password is provided to every customer, where the password is required to be changed every 3 months.

patterns: How do I change my password?
responses: In case you've forgotten your password, click the 'Forgot Password' button on the login page. In case you want to change your password, login to your account and select 'Change Account Details' > 'Change Password'
Sorry, can't understand you
Please give me more info

I'm not sure I understand, but you contact our 24/7 customer care, 1800-455-455
